safetyTips: Standing two metres apart, leave at the door, using gloves, wiping clean.
name: Flower Farm
address: Flower Farm, Oxted Road, Godstone RH9 8DE
description: Offering a wide range of fresh farm produce, home grown and locally sourced vegetables, fruit, meat and eggs reared on the farm, as well as a wide range of bespoke items from artisan nut butters and olive oil to pasta and and chilli jams. Plus a selection of beer and ales, brewed on the farm, wine and cider from a local vineyard. With 48 hour home delivery and collection.
